definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: I don't think we're talking about quantum mechanics here.
sentences.chinese: 我不认为我们这里是在讨论量子力学的问题。

sentences.english: But it does happen in quantum mechanics.
sentences.chinese: 但它在量子力学中就发生了。

sentences.english: So, molecular orbital theory, on the other hand, is based on quantum mechanics.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面分子轨道理论，是基于量子力学的。

sentences.english: String theory smooths out the mathematical inconsistencies that currently exist between quantum mechanics and the theory of relativity.
sentences.chinese: 弦理论缓和了量子力学和相对论之间的数学矛盾。

sentences.english: Can Quantum-Mechanical Description of Physical Reality Be Considered Complete?
sentences.chinese: 物理现实的量子力学描述能否认为是完备的？

sentences.english: In this paper two concrete problems concerned fundamental questions in quantum mechanics are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了量子力学的基本性问题中的两个具体问题。

sentences.english: The study of Schrödinger's cat can help us to understand the nature of quantum mechanics.
sentences.chinese: 对薛定谔猫的研究，有助于我们理解量子力学的本质。

sentences.english: These results are derivable from the theory of quantum mechanics.
sentences.chinese: 这些结果是根据量子力学理论推导出来的。

sentences.english: Quantum mechanics scored first in providing an explanation of atomic structure .
sentences.chinese: 量子力学首先在提供对原子结构的说明中取得成功。

sentences.english: Schrödinger's Cat also helped to illustrate just how weird the rules of quantum mechanics really were.
sentences.chinese: 薛定锷的猫同时也说明了量子力学的理论是多么奇怪。

sentences.english: Theory tools needed to process the quantum mechanical system control are pointed out last.
sentences.chinese: 最后指出了进行量子力学系统控制所需要的理论工具。

sentences.english: The wafers can also be used to study some of the more peculiar effects of quantum mechanics.
sentences.chinese: 这些晶片也可用来研究量子力学的更多奇特作用。

sentences.english: In this example we exploited the quantum mechanics principle of superposition.
sentences.chinese: 本例中，我们利用了量子力学的叠加原理。

sentences.english: Physicists have struggled to marry quantum mechanics with gravity for decades.
sentences.chinese: 物理学家努力了几十年将万有引力结合到量子力学。

sentences.english: R. Shankar, Principles of Quantum Mechanics.
sentences.chinese: 高等量子力学，喀兴林著。

sentences.english: It has been generally accepted that uncertainty principle is the philosophical basis for probability lnterpre tation of traditional quantum mechanics.
sentences.chinese: 不确定性原理是正统量子力学几率解释的哲学基础。

pinyin: bu4 que4 ding4 xing4 yuan2 li3
liang4 zi3 dian4 dong4 li4 xue2
